summary: An F.B.I. Agent teams up with a tracker to pursue a murderer after he vanishes into the mountains and infiltrates a hiking group.
cast: Sidney Poitier|Tom Berenger|Kirstie Alley|Clancy Brown|Richard Masur|Andrew Robinson|Kevin Scannell|Frederick Coffin|Michael MacRae|Robert Lesser|Milton Selzer|Les Lannom|Walter Marsh|Frank C. Turner|Sam Hiona|Michael Chapman|Janet Rotblatt|Ken Camroux-Taylor|Howard Storey|Fred Henderson|Robyn Gildemeester|Jerry Wasserman|Gloria Lee|Freda Perry|Kevin McNulty|William S. Taylor|Ric Reid|Claire Vardiel|Blu Mankuma|Gary Hetherington|Allan Lysell|Michele Goodger|Beatrice Boepple|Darcelle Chan|Marynna Danguy|Craig Saunders|Carole Henshall|Andrew Rhodes|Bill Croft|Noah Beggs|John Douglas|John Molnar|John Ryan|Jim van Dijk
title: Dispara a matar
